attributes.action: support the actions of birmingham city councils bid to build a new stadium for birmingham city
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it seems that a very very small number of aston villa supporters have taken it upon themselves to oppose the stadium application from Birmingham city.
this is a counter petition in support of the fine work that the city council do, which goes unappreciated by many that speak form the suburbs.
surely it is only fair to oppose a local council if you live within the boundaries of that council

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
